185528683.review:
Every bit as good now as the day it came out. No nonsense, no frills, just an old-school arcade time trial game and little besides. All the better for it. This game is not realistic in the slightest, and has about as much in common with sim racing titles as with QWOP, but that's not the point.

TMNF is easy to learn but extremely difficult to master. Highly addictive. You will spend hours chasing your own ghost, resetting every time you brake a meter too early or the game decides to give you bad RNG, and you'll resent none of it.

This is an old title and hasn't been updated in a very long time, and though its UI has not aged well the game itself has a timeless art style, looks acceptable by modern standards and runs without any modification on Win11 with support for 4K and high refresh rates.  

Among the greatest free-to-play titles in existence. A joy to waste time in.

184698090.review:
Un juego adictivo, con unos circuitos super creativos, editor de circuitos, servidores con mapas de la comunidad para tener básicamente contenido infinito y encima es completamente gratuito el juego. Hay una versión con más contenido de este mismo juego llamada United Forever, que también es un juegazo, añade más tipos de coche y edición, muy recomendado también.

Por cierto, si tienes problemas al crearte tu cuenta, es porque al ser un juego antiguo, debes cambiar una configuración en el proceso de crearte la cuenta. Tienes que hacer lo siguiente: en el buscador de Windows escribe Opciones de internet, pincha en la opción con ese nombre y en la nueva ventana vete a opciones avanzadas, dentro de ahí, en el apartado de seguridad marca la casilla de Usar TLS 1.0 y guarda los cambios. Con eso podrás hacerte la cuenta, una vez creada puedes volver a desmarcar la casilla y listo.

184086959.review:
What A Game!...If you want to dive into a game driving formula cars, listening to upbeat music but too lazy to select music yourself and all that.., just drop down into any server you like and your'e good to go. I personally love the NASCAR server, you should definitely check it out, nice music + tracks.
You can play with your friends too, and create your own tracks etc....the community is good too, not gonna lie.

Things I don't like: Understeer Mechanics are not good, the car goes understeering like crazy sometimes, atleast for me.

Overall a nice, challenging & intense experience. Small Bugs & Glitches here and there, though they can often become features.
